message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $120. I think you'll find it's a real steal!
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your budget concerns, but $90 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate the compromise, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me at that price?
